coform
===============================

version number: 0.0.1
author: Michael Merickel

Overview
--------

A thin form handling library written around colander.

Installation / Usage
--------------------

To install use pip:

    $ pip install coform


Or clone the repo:

    $ git clone https://github.com/mmerickel/coform.git
    $ python setup.py install
